title: [Large-scale] Clinical Instructional Development Program: Competency Enhancement Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in medical education and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Feedback-driven training program in simulation/VR environments for medical professionals

learning_goals: Participants can apply the three core elements of the Proctor Model (formative, normative, and summative guidance) with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment
Participants can develop and revise clinical guidance scenarios at least three times based on feedback from two peer instructors
Participants can achieve a minimum 2-point improvement (on a 5-point scale) in pre-post knowledge assessments by the end of the 4-week program
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
